#summary This wiki page is for 340 Cipher FACTS.

= Introduction =

Some of these are obvious, but will be stated here so that *all* facts are included.

= Details =

==Fact==

1 - there are 340 symbols in the 340 cipher.

2 - there are 63 unique symbols.

3 - this is not a proven fact, but the 340 cipher is not a simple substitution cipher.

4 - this is not a proven fact, but it is now believed that the 340 cipher is a character substitution + character transposition cipher.
